item.title: CEDA Document Repository Move to Zenodo Thursday 24th November
item.description: On Thursday 22nd November we’ll be transferring items from the CEDA Document Repository service to Zenodo  , a service operated by CERN, where CEDA will maintain a ‘CEDA Document Repository Community’ to aid access to dataset related documentation.
